name: Holiday Cheer 3 (itch)
description:
Discover this cheerful Christmas themed  match 3 puzzle game on your PC!  Ease into Classic match 3 style puzzle game play for a holiday filled with fun!

Game Features: ARE YOU IN THE HOLIDAY MOOD?

We all love to soak up that holiday atmosphere that comes but once a year! Escape in to this puzzling winter wonderland. Explore a Christmas decorated Victorian house with 100 levels of match 3 game play!

CASUAL GEM-MATCHING FUN

The classic casual match 3+ game play we have all come to love!

SPECIAL GEMS

Create Snowflake Gem which explodes into a hundred snowflakes when you destroy it or match the Christmas Light Gem for a string of lights to destroy rows of gems. The Santa Claus Gem  destroys all gems of the color you match it with.

ENJOY THE MUSIC

The upbeat soundtrack featuring 10 atmospheric Christmas songs will have you humming along in no time!

BEAUTIFUL GRAPHICS

Beautiful  graphics with 10 unique Christmas themed backgrounds for gameplay!

MORE FEATURES

Fast Game Play Action — Make matches while new gems fall into place.

Holiday Cheer 3 has high resolution graphics designed for desktop systems and as such is recommended for a HD display of 720p or above with a video card with at least 2GB of video memory.
